challenge: Reflect and pray to God for the New Year
Make a list of what you have gratitude for
Pick one verse and share your meditations on it
Make a list of new habits (share with group, if possible, for accountability)
Meditate on a Psalm and share with the group
Spend at least 20 minutes in quiet time prayer with God
Connect with God in nature for at least 5 minutes
Give more than normal in tithe
Watch a Christian movie / read a Christian book
Pick one fruit of the spirit to emulate
Journal your feelings or a prayer to God
Take communion together
Make a prayer list of people and pray for them (share with group, if possible)
Full social media fast
Share a Bible verse with three different people
Study basic apologetics
Forgive someone (Colossians 3:13)
Do at least 15 minutes of exercise
Check in on 2 people you haven"t spoken to you in a while
Do one act of kindness for someone (and another for family, if possible)
Pray for / share the gospel to one stranger
Pick one sinful habit to fast from
Encourage and honor someone
Pick one chapter and share your meditations
Write a poem, prayer, devotional, etc...
Practice Lectio Divina (Read/Reflect/Respond/Rest)
Spend at least 30 minutes in worship and share one song
Practice Sabbath (Rest in Jesus)
Leave encouraging note and verses around campus / town (Prayer Walk?)
Preach a short sermon to each other
Share what God has been teaching you/testimonies
